data.message: How can I get rid of that "Direct" icon that started to appear at too of FB app?

replies.message: Hey, Gevorg. You'll be able to swipe away from these features when you don't want to create content or flip through Stories that friends have shared and continue browsing your News Feed like you've done before. However, people cannot remove these features from the Facebook app. -Aurora
Ugh. I hate this new feature. I will never use it.
Yes why is fb trying to be like Instagram? Also why can i not see who is available for chat with out being taken directly to messenger app?
Ugh!!!!! I wish I never did the update just for that reason!!!!! I liked swiping from right to left to see who was online!! So annoyed by this update!!!
But I don't want to see the feature even without scrolling. It's like Messenger - being forced on everyone despite not everyone needing it. Why not make both of them optional?
And FB even doesn't tell us what's changed. It just repeats same "offline likes" for more than a year
A big thumb down! Bad feature. Many of us don't like it or want. We should be able to disable it.
